WPC Doors & Windows

Experience the perfect blend of nature and technology. Our Wood Polymer Composite (WPC) products offer the aesthetic appeal of natural wood without the drawbacks. They are 100% waterproof, termite-proof, and fire-retardant, making them the ideal choice for Chennai's humid climate.

  • ✓ Lifetime Termite Guarantee
  • ✓ No Polishing Required
  • ✓ Eco-Friendly Material
View WPC Collection

uPVC Windows

Upgrade your home with our high-performance uPVC windows. Designed for energy efficiency and sound insulation, they keep your home cool and quiet. Our windows are UV resistant and will not fade or yellow over time, ensuring a pristine look for years to come.

Explore uPVC Windows

Epoxy Coating for TMT

Protect the structural integrity of your building with our Fusion Bonded Epoxy (FBE) coating. Corrosion is the silent killer of concrete structures. Our advanced coating provides a robust barrier against moisture and chlorides, significantly extending the life of your TMT bars.

Learn About Epoxy

House Lifting Services

Is your road level higher than your house? Facing frequent waterlogging? Our expert house lifting services can raise your home safely without any structural damage. We use state-of-the-art jack technology to lift your house to a safe elevation, protecting your property value.

Get Lifting Details

Common Questions

How does WPC compare to traditional wood? ▼
WPC (Wood Polymer Composite) offers the look and feel of wood but with superior durability. Unlike wood, it is 100% waterproof, termite-proof, and doesn't warp or rot, making it ideal for Chennai's humid climate.
Is uPVC suitable for Chennai weather? ▼
Absolutely. uPVC windows are UV resistant and do not fade under strong sunlight. They also provide excellent thermal insulation, keeping your home cooler during hot summers.
What maintenance is required for WPC and uPVC? ▼
Very little maintenance is required. Unlike wood that needs regular polishing and painting, WPC and uPVC only need occasional cleaning with a damp cloth to look brand new.
Do you provide warranty on your products? ▼
Yes, we stand by the quality of our products. We offer warranties on our WPC doors and uPVC windows against manufacturing defects. Please contact us for specific warranty details per product.
